title: Looking for Fat Filled 70s Fonts
content:
Does anyone know what this font is (assuming it's not hand-drawn) or, more importantly, have ideas for other filled-in super heavy fonts like this? I like the combination of the over-inflated but still geometric look. I seem to remember a lot of stuff like this in the old Letraset catalog and on album covers from the 1970s.... ideas?  
Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111216181435im_/http:/typophile.com/files/445394343_cf55249c17_3420.jpg)
author: BrooklynRob

comments.content: I think it's probably more '80s than '70s. And it's back in full force now: [Fat Font Fad](http://web.archive.org/web/20111216181435/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42643)!

Wow, thanks for the link/list!  
(fat is where it's at!)  
 ;-)
